gems.name: yobi-http
gems.info: +Yobi+ is a terminal tool to make +HTTP+ requests and display responses in a friendly way inspired by HTTPie. It allows you to easily send HTTP requests and view the responses in a human-readable format, making it easier to debug and test APIs from the command line. === The main features of Yobi include: * Support for various HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.) * Customizable request +headers+ and +body+ * Pretty-printed responses with syntax highlighting * Download mode saves response content to a file * Low dependency and easy installation via RubyGems
